astc_license.description: ASTC License (Section/Page: Intro p.1) License identifier as issued by IDPH

facility_name.description: ASTC Name (Section/Page: Intro p.1) Official facility name

address_line1.description: ASTC Address (Section/Page: Intro p.1) Street address

address_state.description: State (Section/Page: Intro p.1) Fixed to IL

address_zip.description: Zip Code (Section/Page: Intro p.1) 5-digit ZIP or ZIP+4

fein.description: Federal Employer Identification Number (FEIN) (Section/Page: Intro p.1)

section_i_year.description: Section I Reporting Year (Section/Page: p.1) Fixed year for Section I

section_ii_fy_label.description: Section II Fiscal Year (Section/Page: p.15) Most recent fiscal year available

ownership_type.description: Ownership Type (Section/Page: Sec I p.2) Choose one

ownership_other.description: Other Ownership Type (Specify) (Section/Page: Sec I p.2) Required if ownership_type = other_*

reg_agent_name.description: Name of Registered Agent (Section/Page: Sec I p.2) Required if ownership requires RA (see types)

reg_agent_address.description: Registered Agent Address (Section/Page: Sec I p.2)

reg_agent_city_state_zip.description: Registered Agent City, State, Zip+4 (Section/Page: Sec I p.2)

reg_agent_phone.description: Registered Agent Telephone Number (Section/Page: Sec I p.2) Format as printed on form

related_entities.description: Related Organizations/Entities (Section/Page: Sec I p.2) List of objects: name, relationship, interest

related_entities[].relationship.description: Relationship (Section/Page: Sec I p.2) e.g., parent, subsidiary, affiliate

related_entities[].interest_type.description: Type of Interest (Section/Page: Sec I p.2) legal, financial, management, etc.

owners.description: Legal Owners/Operators (Section/Page: Sec I p.3) Up to 25 in form; allow more via spreadsheet

owners[].city_state_zip.description: City, State Zip+4 (Section/Page: Sec I p.3)

property_owner_name.description: Property Owner (Section/Page: Sec I p.4) Required if property not owned by legal owner/operator

property_owner_address.description: Property Owner Address (Section/Page: Sec I p.4)

property_owner_city_state_zip.description: Property Owner City, State Zip+4 (Section/Page: Sec I p.4)

property_owner_phone.description: Property Owner Telephone (Section/Page: Sec I p.4)

mgmt_no_contract.description: No Contractual Management (Section/Page: Sec I p.4) True if management NOT performed by independent contractor

mgmt_contractors.description: Contractual Management Contractors (Section/Page: Sec I p.4) Required if mgmt_no_contract = false

staffing_workweek_hours.description: Hours in a full-time work week (Section/Page: Sec I p.4)

fte_admin.description: Administrators (FTEs) (Section/Page: Sec I p.4) Decimal FTEs

fte_don.description: Director of Nursing (FTEs) (Section/Page: Sec I p.4)

fte_other_health.description: Other Health Professionals (FTEs) (Section/Page: Sec I p.4)

fte_other_nonhealth.description: Other Non-Health Professionals (FTEs) (Section/Page: Sec I p.4)

fte_total.description: TOTAL FACILITY PERSONNEL (FTEs) (Section/Page: Sec I p.4) Auto-calculated on form

patients_age_sex.description: Patients by Age Groups and Sex (Section/Page: Sec I p.5) Rows by age bands, counts by sex

patients_age_total.description: TOTAL PATIENTS SERVED (age/sex) (Section/Page: Sec I p.5) Auto-calculated; must match Q6 total

patients_payment_sex.description: Patients by Primary Payment Source and Sex (Section/Page: Sec I p.5-6) Rows by payment source, counts by sex

payment_source.description: Payment Source (Section/Page: Sec I p.6) Medicaid, Medicare, Other Public, Private Insurance, Private Payment, Charity Care

patients_payment_total.description: TOTAL PATIENTS SERVED (payment/sex) (Section/Page: Sec I p.6) Auto-calculated; must match Q5 total

patients_age_male_0_14.description: Male 0–14 (Section/Page: Sec I p.5) Convenience field derived from age/sex table

patients_payment_male_medicaid.description: Male — Medicaid (Section/Page: Sec I p.6) Convenience field derived from payment/sex table

patients_payment_male_other_public.description: Male — Other Public (Section/Page: Sec I p.6)

patients_payment_male_private_insurance.description: Male — Private Insurance (Section/Page: Sec I p.6)

patients_payment_male_private_payment.description: Male — Private Payment (Section/Page: Sec I p.6)

patients_payment_male_charity_care.description: Male — Charity Care (Section/Page: Sec I p.6)

patients_payment_female_other_public.description: Female — Other Public (Section/Page: Sec I p.6)

patients_payment_female_private_insuranc.description: Female — Private Insurance (Section/Page: Sec I p.6)

patients_payment_female_private_payment.description: Female — Private Payment (Section/Page: Sec I p.6)

patients_payment_female_charity_care.description: Female — Charity Care (Section/Page: Sec I p.6)

patients_origin.description: Patients by Place of Origin (Section/Page: Sec I p.7-11) Prefer Zip; else County

origin_zip.description: Zip Code Area (Section/Page: Sec I p.7-11) Required if county not provided

origin_county.description: County Name (Section/Page: Sec I p.7-11) Required if zip not provided

origin_count.description: Number of Patients (Section/Page: Sec I p.7-11)

hours_mon.description: Hours Open Monday (Section/Page: Sec I p.12) Report numeric hours

hours_tue.description: Hours Open Tuesday (Section/Page: Sec I p.12)

hours_wed.description: Hours Open Wednesday (Section/Page: Sec I p.12)

hours_thu.description: Hours Open Thursday (Section/Page: Sec I p.12)

hours_fri.description: Hours Open Friday (Section/Page: Sec I p.12)

hours_sat.description: Hours Open Saturday (Section/Page: Sec I p.12)

hours_sun.description: Hours Open Sunday (Section/Page: Sec I p.12)

hours_total.description: TOTAL HOURS (Section/Page: Sec I p.12) Auto-calculated

rooms_or_class_c.description: Operating Rooms (Class C) (Section/Page: Sec I p.12)

rooms_proc_class_b.description: Procedure Rooms (Class B) (Section/Page: Sec I p.12)

stations_stage1.description: Stage 1 Recovery Stations (Section/Page: Sec I p.12)

stations_stage2.description: Stage 2 Recovery Stations (Section/Page: Sec I p.12)

hospital_relationships.description: Hospital Relationships (Section/Page: Sec I p.12) Contractual relationships incl. transfer agreements

hosp_name_city.description: Hospital Name and City (Section/Page: Sec I p.12)

hosp_patient_transfers.description: Patient Transfers (Section/Page: Sec I p.12) If applicable; enter number of transfers

util_or_c.description: Surgical Utilization — Operating Rooms (Class C) (Section/Page: Sec I p.13) Per specialty category

util_or_c[].category.description: Surgical Category (Section/Page: Sec I p.13) Cardiovascular, Dermatology, General Surgery, Gastroenterology, Neurological, OB/Gynecology, Oral/Maxillofacial, Ophthalmology, Laser Eye Surgery, Orthopedic, Otolaryngology, Pain Management, Plastic, Podiatry, Thoracic, Urology

util_or_c[].cases.description: Number of Cases (Section/Page: Sec I p.13) A case = a patient treated

util_or_c[].setup_hours.description: Room Set-Up Time (hours) (Section/Page: Sec I p.13) Round to nearest 0.25

util_or_c[].surgery_hours.description: Actual Surgery Time (hours) (Section/Page: Sec I p.13) Round to nearest 0.25

util_or_c[].cleanup_hours.description: Room Clean-Up Time (hours) (Section/Page: Sec I p.13) Round to nearest 0.25

util_proc_b.description: Surgical Utilization — Procedure Rooms (Class B) (Section/Page: Sec I p.14) Dedicated and multipurpose

util_proc_b_ded.description: Dedicated Procedure Rooms (Section/Page: Sec I p.14) GI, Laser Eye, Pain Mgmt, Cardiac Cath

util_proc_b_ded[].type.description: Dedicated Type (Section/Page: Sec I p.14) GI, Laser Eye, Pain Management, Cardiac Catheterization

util_proc_b_ded[].surgery_hours.description: Actual Surgery Time (hours) (Section/Page: Sec I p.14)

util_proc_b_multi.description: Multipurpose Procedure Rooms (Section/Page: Sec I p.14) Specify procedure type

util_proc_b_multi[].surgery_hours.description: Actual Surgery Time (hours) (Section/Page: Sec I p.14)

util_proc_b_multi_total_rooms.description: Total Multi-Purpose Procedure Rooms (Section/Page: Sec I p.14) Auto-calculated

util_proc_b_totals.description: TOTALS — Procedure Rooms (Section/Page: Sec I p.14) Auto-calculated summary

util_total_cases.description: TOTAL CASES (Q11 + Q12) (Section/Page: Sec I p.14) Must equal Total Patients Served (Q5 & Q6)

fy_start.description: Fiscal Year Starting Date (Section/Page: Sec II p.15) Most recent fiscal year available

fy_end.description: Fiscal Year Ending Date (Section/Page: Sec II p.15)

finance_source.description: Source of Financial Information (Section/Page: Sec II p.15) e.g., Audited FS, Review, Compilation, Tax Return

capex_total.description: Capital Expenditures — Total (Section/Page: Sec II p.15) Report total for fiscal year
